org.xmlcml.cml.converters
Class AbstractConverter

java.lang.Object
  org.xmlcml.cml.converters.AbstractConverter
All Implemented Interfaces:
Converter
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbstractAggregator, AbstractCompchem2CMLConverter, AbstractIndexer, AbstractMerger, AbstractSplitter, AbstractTransformConverter, AgilentLCMS2CMLConverter, Bruker2XMLConverter, CDX2CDXMLConverter, CDX2CMLConverter, CDXML2CMLConverter, CIF2CIFXMLConverter, CIF2CMLConverter, CIFXML2CMLConverter, CML2CMLConverter, CML2CMLLiteConverter, CML2MDLConverter, CML2SDFConverter, CML2XYZConverter, CMLEditorList, CMLHNMRSpect2SVGConverter, CMLJob2CMLAbsJobConverter, CMLSpect2JDXConverter, CMLSpect2SVGConverter, CMLTransformMolecule, DLPolyConfig2CMLConverter, DummyConverter, DummyMol2CMLConverter, GaussianLog2CompchemConverter, HTML2XHTMLConverter, JDX2CMLConverter, MDL2CMLConverter, MMReRDF2CMLReactConverter, NWChemLog2CompchemConverter, OSCAR2CMLSpectConverter, PubchemXML2CMLConverter, RawCML2CompleteCMLConverter, ReactionMergeDiff, SDF2CMLConverter, Text2XMLConverter, XML2TextConverter, XML2XMLConverter, XYZ2CMLConverter
public abstract class AbstractConverter
extends java.lang.Object
implements Converter

Plumbing and IO wrangling for Converter classes - allows converter implementations to implement a single conversion method between the native object types of the data types on input and output.

Author:
jimdowning

marshallToText

public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> marshallToText(nu.xom.Element element,
                                                              int indent)
A convenience method to convert a XOM Element to "UTF-8" encoded XML text in the form of a List of Strings.

Parameters:
element - the XOM Element to be serialized to XHTML
indent - the amount of indentation per nested indent measured in spaces
Returns:
a List of Strings

marshallToText

public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> marshallToText(nu.xom.Document doc,
                                                              int indent,
                                                              java.lang.String encoding)
A convenience method to convert a XOM Document to XHTML text with a given encoding in the form of a List of Strings.

Parameters:
doc - the XOM Document to be serialized to XHTML
indent - the amount of indentation per nested indent measured in spaces
encoding - the encoding to use, e.g. "UTF-8" or "ISO-8859-1"
Returns:
a List of Strings
